You were tempted to explore your new curves, but you held back, knowing Emily was still present in your mind.

Placing your first sandal embraced foot into the garage you headline for any and all boxes so you can explore your first thought since musing for a plan-- which would be that since Emily didn't give you a body, hers must still be in the garage somewhere or better, she got bored of your body and stashed it somewhere. Your search yields...
12112212211.title: Resist temptation, make a plan to get your body...

choices: You try and find a way to swap heads with Steph so you can impersonate her.
Give Steph her body back so she can try to get your sister.
121122122111.content:
A sigh fueled by disappointment and frustration smack along the closed garage doors and back to your ears, along with the followed "Damn!" you released shortly after. Out of reasons to be in the garage you make your way briskly back to your room as to not be seen by anyone who may or may not find it odd that you have the body of a young girl. "That sure took awhile. Did you have your way with me without me??" Steph asks in a bashful yet blunt mouthing. "What!? No!" You defend in haste, waving your small hands in gesture any baseball fan would consider 'safe.' "I was just going to the garage to see if I could find my sister's body or my own. You don't have a body so one just has to be lying around somewhere!" You explain to her.

"Oh..." She responds, sounding rather upset. You can't believe she is disappointed that you didn't just go nuts with your sexual urges and in so many ways, you curse yourself for containing your self-control-- you are really curious about what it would feel like too. "So did you find anything?" She does inevitably ask, to which you give your unfortunate findings. "No, nothing. She must be hiding it somewhere else. Still, even if I have a body, I can't go walking around like this. I can't imagine how many bizarre stares I'll get with this unnatural body mixture. My sister will know what's up instantly too, there is no way she'll go anywhere near the thing. I need a plan or something..." You detail your meandering thoughts as they come to you, the gentle hands you wield bristling against your unshaven face.

She hums a long "Hmm..." and looks plainly up at the ceiling, struggling her finest to let you know she is also thinking-- about you can only imagine. "It's a shame you can't swap heads with me and be me completely. Though, if you swap me back, I can try and convince your sister." She says...

One of the mentioned thoughts does spring forth at least some sort of plan...
121122122111.title: No results, you can't find a body.

choices: Leave her be and search for the body your sister had to stash away somewhere.
1211221221111.content:
Sparking an idea or at least a hope, you grab Steph without her consent and take her with you to the garage. Questions ensue as you place her near the guillotine and begin to scratch your head in skeptical analysis of the device. "What are you doing? At least tell me..." You do little to answer her but after several repetitions of the last line you eventually give in and respond. "I'm trying to think of a way to swap... I dunno, heads or something."

"Oh..." She mutters and falls into silence but still manages to interrupt your thoughts as she gazes softly at you in utter infatuation with a long delighted smile and flushing cheeks. You try and shake her cuteness out of your head and remind yourself of her age but it becomes monumentally more difficult when she is no longer brought down in size and depth by her body. You feel bad trying to recklessly cut into her head-- sure, all the previous cuts have ended with smooth skin where the cut was but that doesn't change the hesitant idea of cutting through someone's head. You doubt you can cut open the top of her head and pop out her brain due to the cauterizing of each cut but perhaps you could just cut around the entire brain.

You decide to...
1211221221111.title: You try and find a way to swap heads with Steph...

choices: Okay that wasn't what I expected
12112212211111.content:
“Okay, I guess the only way to find out is to try,” you say and gently pick up Steph’s head and place just the top of it under the guillotine blade.
“I’m not too sure about this,” Steph says, but realises she can’t stop you now.

Without pause you release the blade and the top of Steph’s head falls to the ground. You pick her back up and turn her so you can look down at the top of her head, and you smile, instead of seeing skin, you see the top of her brain.
“Did it work?” Steph asks in anticipation.
“Better than expected, this is going to be cool.”

You pick up the other part of her head and place both parts next to each other on the workbench. A quick look around and you finally find the large glass jar your dad uses when he does homemade pickled eggs.
“Should be big enough,” you say walking to the currently empty jar.
“What’s the jar for?” Steph asks in all innocence, not yet realising your intentions.

You remove the lid from the jar and place it next to Steph’s detached head, you then pick up her head,
“This might feel a little strange,” you say and turn her head upside down.
Her brain drops out of her head and into the jar cleanly,
“Hey, what the hell just happened?”
You turn her head round so she can see the jar.
Steph’s mouth drops open in shock, and it takes her a few moments to gather her thoughts.
“That’s me?”
“Yeap, now I need to see if I can get my brain inside your head, talk about surreal.”
“I guess you could call me a real air head now,” she giggles.
You roll your eyes at the joke and put her head down so she can still see her own brain, and watch you at the same time.
First you remove your own head again; thankful you keep control of Steph’s young body.
Next you take the top of your own head off with the blade and carry your open toped head towards Steph.
“I have no idea what will happen, but here goes,”
Steph looks up at you with her eyes as you turn your head upside down to let your brain fall and land in her currently empty head.
12112212211111.title: Try cutting her head.

choices: Put Steph's brain into your own head, you still need her help.
121122122111111.content:
For a moment everything goes black, not a single sense appears to work, only you are still aware.
Time has no meaning like this, and as you start to think something went wrong your sense hit you without warning.
You blink your eyes a few times and concentrate on the body you can still feel, and then you breath a little easier as you regain control.
You smile as you look up at your own face.

It worked!

You put your vacant looking head down and pick up your new one, within just a few moments Steph’s head is once more on her own body, the top of her head is also reattached, but there is one difference, you control it all.

“Yes, it worked.” You gasp as the voice you hear is Steph’s own, but then you smile again, “this is going to take a little time to get use to, but my meddling sister wont see me coming now.”

You look at the jar containing Steph’s brain and wonder just what she is feeling right now, if anything, since that is now all that remains of her. You then look at your own empty head and its dormant face.
121122122111111.title: It works better than expected

choices: Set up a few traps here and wait for your sister to return
Go looking for your sister and plan on the move.
1211221221111112.content:
You suddenly blink, and then shake your head, for a moment you could have sworn you were looking at Steph.
The image appears again, and then your smile grows even more.
As you concentrate you watch your own head smile back, and then you start to see not just from Steph’s eyes, but also from your own.
“Now this is cool,” your own head talks to you.
“Oh you bet,” you say with Steph’s voice.

Not only do you have complete control of Steph’s entire body, but also you still have control of your own head.

“With a little more practice it will be like having eyes in the back of my head, now my sister will have no chance against me.” You say with Steph’s voice.
“You can say that again,” you say with your own voice.
“Sis always did say I talked to myself too much,” you giggle with Steph’s voice.
“That she did, but I’ve never talked to myself quite like this before,” your own voice replied.

Picking up the jar with Steph’s brain, you hide it on the shelves, you’re still not sure how she will feel about this, but the next time she opens her eyes they will be your sisters. You did promise after all, and you never go back on your promises.

You now start to plan how to take back your old body from your sister, you will have to really outsmart her, as even though you have a whole body again, Steph’s body isn’t strong enough to take your sister head on.
1211221221111112.title: Realise something new.

12112212211111122.content:
You couldn't wait around here and just expect your sister to come wandering back! Who knows what she might do with your body while you sat idle? No, you MUST find her, and the sooner the better. You closed up the garage and left your empty head on a shelf in the corner, where it had a clear view of the entire room. If Emily did come back, you were willing to bet that it would be for the guillotine.

Now, given what you knew of your sister, she would most likely be hanging with her friends right now, either at the mall or the cinema. Somehow, a complete change in her physical makeup didn't seem like it would be enough to get your sister to change her habits. You decided to start your search with the mall. Pulling the blade out of the guillotine and throwing it in a backpack, you headed off in Stephanie's body.

It wasn't a long walk, but it was an awkward one. You still weren't used to having a female body, and it bothered you how the wind kept blowing hair in your face and how slowly you seemed to be moving, given your petite stature and shorter legs. Also bothersome, though also pleasant in a way was how your hips swayed with each step, as if you were dancing ever so slightly to an easy rhythm. You had expected... well, more bounce in your chest, as you had noticed earlier Steph's lack of a bra. The reason for this was now clear- her breasts weren't quite large enough to demand one. You tried running for a few steps, and then felt it- not an uncomfortable pull, but a bit of a jiggle. Satisfied with your experiment, you continued along at a brisk walk.

You arrived at the mall and began searching the shops, paying special attention to those you remembered your sister frequenting. You'd searched a good portion of the place and were beginning to feel desperate when you spotted Emily with her gaggle of friends. They were on their way out of the food court, and seemed to be headed in the direction of the washrooms. Perfect.

You followed, staying at a good distance, so as not to arouse suspicion. When the group made it to the washrooms, your sister split off from the pack and went into the men's room. Good to see that she was keeping mindful of her new gender, at least. You, however, had just been presented with a perfect opportunity to reclaim what was rightfully yours, and were ready to sacrifice this particular custom. Taking care not to be seen, you slipped into the men's room after Emily. Thankfully, the place was deserted, and glancing at the gaps below the stall doors, you recognized your shoes in the far stall. Pulling out the blade, you dove to the floor and slid under the door, catching your sister, literally, with her pants down.
"Wha-" she began to shout, clearly surprised at the sudden appearance of a teenage girl brandishing a large blade, to say nothing of the location. You lopped off her head before she could finish the word. Catching it, you leveled the blade with her eyes. "Shut up and don't move, or I'll slice your brain apart and flush it down the toilet," you threatened. Emily's eyes widened in fear, and your headless body slumped over on the toilet.

You breathed a sigh of relief. You'd stopped Emily and effectively recovered your body. But now you faced a problem- how were you going to get your body back to the house? You couldn't just leave Steph's here, everyone would think there had been a murder or something; and after all, she did help you. Throwing away her body would be the worst possible way to pay her back. You could try and coerce Emily into walking your body back willingly, though you weren't sure she could be trusted, and she might make a run for it. The other option was to use the guillotine blade- if you put half of your brain in Emily's head and reattached it to your body, maybe you could control both. This thought scared you a little, though, and you weren't entirely sure how you would do it... or if it would work.
12112212211111122.title: Go looking for your sister and plan on the move.

choices: Take her home. A disembodied brain could come in handy.
Make good on your earlier threat to chop her brain up and flush it.
121122122111111221.content:
It looks like there's nothing for it. After you place your (Stephanie's) head on your body, you grab Emily's now powerless head and carefully slice the top of it off. Once that's done you pull out her brain and drop it on the floor. "Hey what are you-" Emily begins to protest. However, when her brain hits the floor, the splat causes her to lose focus. She sits there drooling with her eyes crossed for a little bit while you cut your own brain out.

After you've pulled your brain out, you cut it in half and place the right half back in your skull. Just as you're about to put the left half in Emily's skull though, she regains focus. "Ugh, what happened? Wait! Sto-" Before she can finish protesting you drop the other half of your brain into her head.

You blink for a bit, then grin. It worked! You can now see out of Emily's head, in addition to yours and Stephanie's. After a few quick swaps, Emily's head is back on your body, and Stephanie's is back on hers. Both of them have half of your brain in their heads. You have your body with Emily's head walk over to her brain and pick it up.

As you examine it, you see that it's become a bit deformed where it landed on the ground. However, it seems to be recovering, so you assume that the magic allows it to heal itself a bit. As you toss all that remains of your sister from one hand to the other, you wonder what you should do with her.
121122122111111221.title: Cut your brain in half.

The thrill of being able to dress up, or rather, dress down Stephanie's body for your own amusement is one that was well worth the money you found in your jeans. Emily must of had plans to buy something and taken some of her own money before leaving the house. There's not much guilt for spending her money though. She won't be needing it anymore. Besides the money went towards purchasing a seductive mini skirt, heels, and a tank top that would be indecent if you reached your arms up.

After purchasing the new attire you decide it is time to head home. Once there you find a similar jar to that of the one Stephanie is now occupying. You laughingly write "Stephanie" over the face of Stephanie's jar as well. You can only imagine what must be running through her mind at this point. You place both the jars on the shelf and then prepare to give Stephanie her body back, when you begin to think...

Answer: "Sorry, having a busy night maybe later."
12112212211111122111.content:
You decide Stephanie can wait until you find Emily's body. It's not like she is going anywhere anyways. You search around the house for Emily's body and eventually find it in her bed. She left her body covered up in bed that if anyone who didn't know the current whereabouts of her brain would think she was asleep. You help pull up her body still in the same attire she had been the previous day and decide to test a theory of yours. You remove the half of your brain that was still in your head and then remove the top of Emily's vacant head. You carefully cut off a minuscule part of your brain and leave it in your head as you transfer the rest to Emily's body.

As you drop your brain into Emily's head you can now see from her body's point of view, your body's point of view, and Stephanie's body's point of view. "This is amazing" you say from Emily's body. "I would have to agree with that" you respond from your body. After getting used to a third body you hear a slight vibrating noise. After a bit of searching you eventually find Emily's cellphone set to vibrate.

"Hello?" you answer from Emily's body. "Hey, Emily can you come down to the school? I could use a spare set of hands for an upcoming project." It's Ashley, one of your sisters school friends. She is a 5'8, black haired, glasses wearing, and rather large chested brainiac that was always building or working on something. There was no doubt her brain and body would be a prize to your collection, but should you?
12112212211111122111.title: You still need to find Emily's body for her.

She went to a private school with a strict dress code. The uniform was a long sleeved tight fitting shirt and a skirt. Nothing revealing, but still was an appealing look. You wander back to where Stephanie and Emily's brains are and pick up the jar containing Stephanie and begin to think of what to do. Might become a regular thing for you.

Decide you would rather have both her mind and body.
1211221221111112211112.content:
You decide that since Ashley will be a part of your collection anyways there can be only the enjoyment of her reaction from bringing them. So, you pack Stephanie and Emily's brains into your backpack along with the blade. It isn't a long drive to Emily's school, but the constant enjoyment of your other two bodies is a welcome distraction from the late night roads.

As you pull up to the school you can see a few parked cars meaning there was more people here than Ashley, still undeterred you take your backpack and head into the school. With a bit of navigation and a few trips back to the office to find a map you eventually find Ashley hard at work in one of the school machine shops.

"Ah, your finally here. I just need you to help me with this thing. It's suppose to be a high tech disk reader, the issue now is that the machine is beyond what a disk can hold so it's too powerful" she informs you not getting up from her chair or even turning around to look at you. You begin unpacking your backpack and carry over Emily's brain along with the blade snug behind your back. "Interesting, but first there is something I would like you to look at for me." You say as you walk up behind her. "Fine just make it.." she starts to say as she turns around and is greeted with the sight of Emily's brain still in the jar. "Is this some kind of joke?" She takes the jar and removes Emily and begins tossing her around as she examines it. "If this is a joke you spared no expense this thing is very realistic, but I know it's not because your right here." She states. "Well actually, I'm not Emily." you explain how the three of you had ended up where you are also revealing Stephanie's brain from her hiding place.

"That's incredible, but I still want to test it and see if your just a really good liar" she accuses. Ashley takes the blade and shoves it into your hands. "Now remove my brain like you did theirs" she almost demands. You almost eagerly slide the blade through the top of her head and remove her brain with ease. "Now would you like this thing jarred or perhaps set on a pedestal?" You ask jokingly as you show her her disembodied brain. The look of shock and awe is indescribable in the volumes she showed. She swipes her brain from your hands and begins probing at it with her pencil each action causing some part of her to either twitch or spasm in some way. "I can't believe it this is actually my brain...this is me." She says still clearly stunned. She shoves her brain back into your hands and goes back to work on her machine clearly some new idea had worked itself into her now displaced mind.

It would be easy enough now to take over her body and be on your way, but curiosity grips you as you watch her work on the machine you finally ask, "So what exactly are you doing now?" She doesn't even turn around as she attaches a sliding tray to the machine and answers "This thing is too powerful to scan information from disks, but it may be powerful enough to scan information from a human brain!" She exclaims almost joyously. Ashley grabs Emily's jar and dumps her into the tray then slides her into the machine. The main screen of the machine flickers for a bit and the word scanning repeatedly flashes a crossed the screen before finally a solid image emerges.

The image is of Emily's head. She floats on the screen as if her body had been cut away and she was left in zero gravity. "What in the...Ashley!?!? Ashley listen you have to help me he has left me in this jar all day! All I can do is float in there somehow still aware of my surroundings but unable to do anything!" Emily pleads from the speakers of the machine. "Whoa it actually works! I can actually transfer a persons thought into digital information!' Ashley exclaims obviously ignoring Emily's pleads. "You can't be serious!?!? Ashley get me out of here and get my bo..." her voice cuts out as the machine's screen blinks an error message. Ashley hurriedly begins working on the machine pulling out Emily's brain and simply tossing her onto the counter. "Well I found the problem. We are gonna need a new part to keep this thing working." She tells as she takes her brain from you. "Me. The machine can't process the information fast enough to coup with the human mind, but if I put mine in I can control the flow...but I will lose my body."

Unscrewing her jar, you gently lift her out and plop her on the machine's scanning tray, and let Ashley's brain work her magic, translating Stephanie's thoughts into audible words.

"Ugh.... Eric? Is that you?"

You grin. "Yup! It's me! How are you feeling, Stephanie?"

Some new music player or something?" She asks, as she sets her hands down in the desk and leans over to try and peek into your bag.

Seizing this perfect moment you quickly draw the blade and cleanly slice through Ms. Claire's neck and then shove her head down onto the desk cutting control to her body. You spend the night preparing jars one for each member of the class and one for Ms. Claire who now sits on her desk. You and Emily both look at them, extremely surprised. "But... But those are our bodies and we need them!" Emily splutters. Polly rolls her eyes.
"Well, if you want to get technical, ownership of a body is really the person who is currently inhabiting the body and since my head is on this body, it effectively is mine now. I certainly don't see your name written on it anywhere" Polly says.
"And in my case, it's not only my head, but my breasts which were also attached. Effectively, we really do own these bodies now" Sally said.
"How dare you!" You say. "That's my body and I want it back right now! You have no right!" You yell at Sally. "I let you BORROW it just so you could have some fun. But not permanently!"

Polly and Sally clearly see that they aren't going to be able to reason with you. So, Polly picks both of you up, putting both her human sized thumbs over your small mouths, and walks back into your room with Sally close behind. Polly then forces both of you into your old doll box and then closes the lid before you two could escape.

"Well" Emily says. "This... could be a problem"
"Yea." You reply softly. "A big problem."
"Think they'll come back?" She asks.
"Yea... Probably. Either to give us alternative bodies or to gloat or tell us about their plans for world domination..."
"World domination?"
"Well, we just gave human bodies to two once-were inanimate dolls that didn't even have basic electronics. Who knows what the magic of the guillotine put in their... err... 'brains'..."
"Oh... yeesh"

Despite there being a few other dolls in here, the area was quite spacious, allowing you and Emily to pull out pieces of cloth from the various different dolls in order to create a makeshift mattress to sleep on. One of the human dolls had put something heavy on top of the box so there was no way you could open it. At least you could breathe, but you wondered if that was even needed due to your plastic bodies.
12413222211212122211.title: Polly and Sally take over...

choices: Find a way to escape the bedroom!
Stay and hope someone rescues you...
124132222112121222111.content:
You and Emily had no idea how long you had been in the box for, but it appeared that night had come and gone. The sun's angle finally reached a perfect point to shine directly through the tiny gap in the box, right into your face which woke you from your slumber in your tiny cardboard prison.

"Emily...?" You ask, prodding your sister"
"Still here..." She said, sighing.

As if on cue, the heavy weight on top of the box shifted off and the lid to your prison came away. Above you, Sally and Polly were looking down at you as if you were a frog to be disected, their faces clearly showing that they had no intention to return your bodies.
"Come to gloat?" You asked, looking up at them in disgust.
"More than that. We decided that since last night was such a success, we'd explain all our plans... Because, I suppose, we have a slightly nice streak" Sally said, picking you and Emily up with her hands.
"Oh, and what are these plans?" You asked.

"Isn't it obvious now?" A voice asked from outside the room. However it was incredibly familiar. Your mouths dropped to the floor as you watched another Polly enter the room... her head on your mothers body.
"Hey, that's my mothers body!" You yelled.
"Well, technically, it's mine now... You already had that discussion with my sister here" Mother Polly said.

***** Authors note: From now on, it's probably best to refer to each different character by the body whose they control. So your mother's body is now Mother Polly, your sisters body is now Emily Polly and your own body is still just Sally but can be changed later if needed. *****

"So whats your plan? Convert the whole family?" Emily asked.
"Oh... Not just the family" A male voice said. Suddenly, your dad's body walked in with a different head on it. A Super Samuel head on it. The same Samuel from the Polly collection.
"But the whole world!" Another polly voice said. To your incredibly surprise, another female body walked in. With Polly's head ontop of your girlfriends body.

"Emily... please explain?" You asked, looking at her.
"Remember how I liked to collect all the different fashion styles of Polly?" Emily started.
"Yea...?
"I had over fifty"
"Exactly!" Emily Polly said. "Enough to start a small army! Imagine a world free from racial inequality, where everyone loves each other, fashion and gets along perfectly!"
"Your mean a media controlled dictatorship?" You asked, raising an eyebrow unimpressively.
"No... We literally mean..."
"Every girl being a Polly" Mother Polly said.
"And every guy being a Samuel" Father Samuel said.
"And what about Sally?" You asked, eyeing her intently.
"Well, a queen must be different from her people" Sally proudly announced. "And I shall be the most unique of all!"
"Yes. Your a female head atop a male body with enhancements" You say, rolling your eyes. "Couldnt get more unique than that"
"How dare you speak to a queen like that!" Sally screeches. But she clearly understands that despite the guillotines magic, it still felt like a male body. "I shall find the most beautiful human body across the planet and take it for my own!" She yelled, marching out of the room. The other Polly's and Samuel followed close behind, leaving only Emily Polly in the room holding you two.

"You know, there's just still one big whole problem to this sort of thing..." Emily said after they had all left.
"What?" Emily Polly asked.
"The flesh parts of your bodies... Your heads may be human, but your actual body isn't... Give it a while and it'll begin to degrade." Emily said.
"A ha ha ha! I thought you might think of that!" Emily Polly said. "But we don't even need to worry about it!"
Emily Polly undid the front of her shirt to reveal Emily's body. To both your considerable surprise, Emily's original body had begun to change. Her shoulders and neckline had become plastic, leaving only a thin blurry mark to show the connection between skin and plastic.
"The conversion shouldnt take more than a week at best" Emily Polly said, doing her shirt back up. "And as we all know, it takes years for plastic to degrade... Hundreds and thousands of years..."

No longer concerned about her safety, Emily Polly sat you both down on your bed and left the room. But before she closed the door on you, damning you to being trapped here, she turned to look at you two.
"Oh, and I'd take a look at yourselves as well. The same conversion is happening to you two. Give it a week and you'll be fully human. Fully minature human" She said, with an evil grin on her face. Then she closed the door.

Sure enough, Emily looked down at her plastic body and discovered that her shoulders had become flesh and blood.
124132222112121222111.title: Sally and Polly return to tell their crazy worl...

choices: The guillotine is there. Thank goodness.
Yea... the guillotine isn't there. Damn.
1241322221121212221111.content:
"Well this really sucks now" You said, folding your arms.
"We're stuck in here. Completely and utterly stuck" Emily said, resigning herself to her fate.
"No. There's only fifty Pollys that can be made... and a few Samuels that you had. Once the police get a hold of whats going on, they'll all be rounded up and somehow this will all be fixed." You said.
"It's not what I would do if I was a mad crazed power hungry three quarter human one quarter doll" Emily said.
"Eh?"
"Well, it's not logical. But think of the thousands of Polly's boxed in the stores and the factories. All the Polly army needs to do it rob a kids shop and create more soldiers"
"You think a fashion diva has that in her?" You asked, unconvinced.
"She's not just a fashion diva... There were a few versions of Polly that were never released to the shelves" Emily said nervously.
"Such as?"
"Army General Polly"

You burst out laughing at that point. The idea of a fashion icon being a General in the mility was just completely absurd to you.
"What next, Private Polly?"
"Yea.... that one actually did hit the shelves"
"Oh damn"
"There's also Scientist Polly"
"Oh shut up. Your making it worse"
"Relax, they can only convert one at a time with the guillotine." Emily said.

"Well, first things first. Let's get out of here and get to the guillotine." You said, standing up on your bed. Fortunately, your bedroom window was still open and it also conveniently opened up onto the roof. A high wind might be a bit of a challenge on the roof for your small bodies but first you had to get there.

Clambering from your bed to your nightstand, you pushed Emily up onto your desk and she then turned around to help pull you up. Moving along the desk, you paused for a minute to think if your computer could be any help. Sadly, nothing useful came to mind. Continuing along, you got to the slightly open window and repeated the same process you used for getting onto the desk - pushing Emily up who then turned around and helped you up.

With a great heave, you and Emily pushed the mighty window open and dropped down onto the roof which was only a few inches below the window sill.
From where your bedroom window was, you could see the entrance to the garage door.
1241322221121212221111.title: Find a way to escape the bedroom!

choices: It's completely safe. Use the guillotine... errr... somehow...
12413222211212122211111.content:
Noticing that the garage door was open, both you and Emily moved into a better position to see all the way into the garage. Thankfully, the guillotine was still there and you whispered a "yessss" to Emily.

"So how do we get down?" Emily asked.
"Your not going to like my idea" You said.
"What..."
"Drainpipe"
"Oh hell no" Emily said. "I have a better idea."

She led across the roof to the back of the house and looked down over the gutter. "There's out exit point"
"A large pile of open grass clippings?" You asked in confusion.
"Most of our body is still plastic. A fall from this height would barely hurt"
"Fine... You first" You said, shaking your head.
Without an iota of concern, Emily jumped off the roof and landed cleanly in the grass pile. Shaking your head, you jumped down. You barely felt anything as your plastic feet and legs hit the grass clippings.
"Well that was good" Emily said, helping you up.

Moving quickly and silently around the house, you managed to reach the open garage where the guillotine was awaiting silently, the blade ready to slice.
12413222211212122211111.title: The guillotine is there. Thank goodness.

choices: Use the guillotine to enhance your escape. This is your only chance!
Just get out of there. Now. Right now.
124132222112121222111111.content:
You and Emily were inside the garage and about to use the guillotine when you heard a car pull up in the driveway. Scrambling like mad to reach a hidden place, you and Emily took safe refuge behind a large bucket on the ground.

The car in question happened to be a pink VW beetle.
"Ewww..." You said in disgust.
"Polly's signature vehicle..." Emily said, shaking her head. "Another variant was the yellow one with no top"
"How crazy was this organisation that made them?" You asked.
"What did you expect?"
"True"

Three Polly's got out of the car, but you didn't recognise any of the bodies. The thought sickened you as you wondered just how many innocent people had been 'converted' last night. One of the Polly's opened the door and at that exact moment, two white birds happened to fly across her face. The timing couldnt have been more perfect in a perfect world. Polly didn't notice them as the door thudded against their behinds and sent them crashing to the floor in the garage. Both you and Emily were extremely surprised.

The three Polly's went into the house without noticing the event unfold and then closed the door behind them. You didn't care where they had come from anymore, all you knew was that you had to get out of there - fast.
124132222112121222111111.title: There's a noise from outside!

choices: Find a place to spend the night...
1241322221121212221111111.content:
"We need to get out of here. Now" You said.
"But what about the guillotine?" Emily asked.
"I have an idea. But I don't know how you'll feel about it." You said. "But we'll have to use the guillotine. This is probably the last time we will be able to use it"
"Dammit. Another of your crazy ideas?"

You ran to where the two birds had fallen. You didn't know if it was a gift from god but you were taking the chance none the less. With Emily's help, you dragged the unconscious - possibly dead - bodies over to the guillotine.
"Okay. I can do this bit. But let's have one last surprise. Turn around Emily" You said.

Rolling her eyes, Emily turned around.
Using the guillotine twice (How you managed to reset it will forever be a mystery), you cut the wings off of the birds.
"Shirt off" You said. Emily sighed and then complied.
"I don't know how two dead birds wi-... the hell?" Emily asked, turning around. "I felt something"
"Gave you wings. Literal wings" You smiled. "Running out of here is likely to be a deathtrap. But flying out? That's possible."
Emily beamed at the idea. "Finally a crazy idea worth getting behind! Okay, turn around!" She said, picking up the remaining set of wings.

Taking your shirt off and discarding it, you allowed Emily to attach the wings to your back.
"Feel like an angel now" You said, flexing your new wings and feeling a rythmic thrum coming on.
"Time to leave" Emily said.

As if on cue again, the door to the garge opened and a Polly walked in.
"How did you escape!" She screamed.
Now forced into a crash course flying lesson, you and Emily bolted for the open garage door and started flapping your new wings as hard as you could. After a few nearly fatal attempts to rise off the ground, you both took flight into the air and soared away from the house.
"Damn you! Damn you all!" Polly yelled as she failed to catch your trailing legs.

Both you and Emily beamed as you soared through the air, heading towards the reserve and hoping to find a way to fix all this.
1241322221121212221111111.title: Use the guillotine to enhance your escape. This...

choices: The tech boys downstairs have been working on something secret...
We found a way to get you into their fortress and find their plans...
12413222211212122211111111.content:
********** SIX MONTHS LATER **********


"Now officially named 'The Plastic War' by international governments, the Polly army continues to cause destablisation across western America and most of Asia. According to official reports, the last remaining human forces in Beijing have gone silent and officials have declared that the region must have come under control of the Polly Army. Scientists are also still no further in discovering how the beings known as Polly's and Samuel's are alive. We'll have more updates on the news for you, right after the break"

Sitting on the edge of a wooden fence watching a TV in a house, both you and Emily looked down and shook your heads. This madness that you both created sparked an international war with the almost invincible Polly army marching across most of America and seizing massive plots of land in China and Japan. Now armed with a multitude of factories churning out thousands of Polly's by the day, the army had increased exponentionally, overwhelming their opposition.

Standing up, you both flew back to the bunker that you and a large group of refugees had constructed in the sewers beneath the city. Since the Polly Army had taken over the city, a massive group of people had had their heads transplanted onto Polly and Samuel bodies, leaving them small and defenseless.

Neither you nor Emily had admitted that you were responsible, instead citing your wings and being the result of further inhuman transplantation. The bunker itself was really just a massive section of the sewers that had been cemented off as it wasnt in use when you had been converted. Now it was home to about five hundred or so refugees, the only unique thing about them being their heads. All wearing generic female and male bodies.
The sewer section itself had been completely remodelled. Wood, string and pieces of metal all formed a massive shanty town where everyone had a place to sleep and eat. If there was one thing that you could be glad on, it's that nobody had fought each other over food or sleeping quarters. Drinking water was free as a transplanted construction team managed to break a hole in a fresh water pipe, creating a morale boosting fresh water creek snaking through the center of the town and then out underneath a gap in the cement.

When you think 'Shanty Town', you'd immediately think that the place looked terrible. Rather, your small stature had made it surprisingly easy to get past the hordes of Polly's and Samuels and gather not only good food but a plentiful amount of construction supplies. As such, while ramshackle, the houses looked like they were in good condition and fresh dirt had been layered down at various parts of the town, quite literally making a serene place.

Also, and this was the most important, the broken sewer was in an area that the Polly's had never ventured, making it completely safe for a large amount of sunlight to stream in during the middle of and the afternoon.

Landing gracefully outside what had become a sort of headquarters, you both walked slowly inside. The two guards outside with their makeshift spears instantly recognised you and parted their barrier to allow you entry.
"How bad is it?" Arnold asked. Arnold was a young man who had been transplanted very early on and was instrumental in forming this community.
"Beijing is lost. Which gives them almost all of China and access to unlimited construction of more Polly's"
"They'll need more fuel soon though" Arnold said, putting a cross on China on a small map of the world you had looted. "They'll try for the middle east next"
Emily sighed, sitting down. "Why do we do this?" She asked.
"Do what?" Arnold asked, setting his pointer down on the table which was really just a sharpened stick.
"All this..." She said, waving her hand at the map. "We can't do anything against them. We're tiny"
"And we use that to our advantage" You said, putting a reassuring hand over your sisters shoulder.
"How? Nobody will ever see it except us"
"Not so" Arnold said.
"Oh?" You asked, looking up. "Care to raise Emily's spirits by filling us in?"
12413222211212122211111111.title: Months later...

124132222112122.content:
"Action, huh?" You say. "Never thought a doll like you would be interested in such a thing."

"Hey, I was surrounded by action figures for I-don't-know-how-long," Sally says.

"Point taken."

Sally drops lot of figures on a table. "Want to know what role you will be playing?"

"Sure."

Sally says, "Since from the neck down you are, well, me, you will be..."
124132222112122.title: "...an action scene."

choices: It's Sally with a female body
Emily and Polly save the day
1241322221122.content:
"If the guillotine is magic then it can give me a female body." Sally said as she held you effortlessly in her hand.

"Well, I'm sorry Sally but that isn't really an option. Now let's go over to Emily's room, I think she's starting a tea party and she'll go banana's." You said to Sally as you looked into her suddenly very large looking eyes. But Sally didn't move. "Come on Sally, you've got legs now, move them."

Sally seemed to be enjoying having real thought for the first time as she was certainly taking her time thinking about what she was going to do next. "No."

"Excuse me?" You said. You had not anticipated a doll to the capacity to rebel. Polly had been perfectly happy being friendly and listening to what Emily had to say so you had assumed that Sally would be no different.

"I said no. I want to be a real girl. Not a stupid boy." Sally said angerly and seemed to be building steam, "Especially not the boy who had me locked away in a box never to be played with."

"But...but you weren't my toy. You weren't mine to play with." You said pleadingly.

"And the same goes for you." Sally said coldly and with a quick movement Sally had gone to the box with your old toys in it, opened it up, and with you screaming out for help she shut you in the box and latched it shut.

You immediately begin pounding on the box. "Let me out of here you bitch! Get me out of here and give me my body back!" You shouted and screamed for what had to have been an hour and you were exhausted and you knew it was useless. Obviously you knew nobody could here you with your tiny body locked away tight in a box surrounded by a bunch of action figures. On the plus side, you didn't feel like you were running out of air and you weren't even hungry at all. "Guess having this stupid doll body has a plus side." Every couple of minutes you'd call out for help, but you knew that it was going to be useless. You just had to hope that Emily noticed her brother's body had a doll's head attached to it soon before Sally did something drastic.

Finally after who knows how many hours, you heard the latches to the box you were in unlock and open. After the blinding rush of light passed you looked up to see who had freed you.
1241322221122.title: Sally wants to be a real girl

choices: Sally takes you back to the guillotine
Sally grabs one of your action figures
12413222211221.content:
"Wakey wakey little dolly. I wanted to show you something. I hope you like it." Sally said as she took you out of the box and set you on a table. She had indeed been true to her word, Sally no longer had your body from the neck down, in fact your body had been carelessly discarded on the floor of your room. Sally was 100% human female...in fact that body was a bit familiar to you. It took you a beat before you recognized it.

"Oh my God! Did you...did you steal my girlfriends body!?"

Sally looked a little confused, "Oh, Beth is your girlfriend? I guess that explains why she came over so quickly when I texted her."

You were starting to get really angry with this girl, "Where is it? Where is Beth's head!"

"Oh yeah, that's another reason I wanted you out of the box. I need to make room for her." Sally said as she held your girlfriend's head by the hair and dropped it into your former box prison.

"Sally, stop this right now. Take the guillotine and put everything right. I promise there won't be any repercussions." You said, but really you were planning to take Sally apart limb from limb, and not with the guillotine.

Sally didn't even hesitate and said, "I am not giving back this body. It's mine and I want it. I want a normal life." Sally paused to think for a second, "And if I'm going to be normal, I'm going to need a boyfriend." Sally then looked over to your own headless body. "And I know just who I want my boyfriend to be." Sally said as she went for the guillotine.
12413222211221.title: It's Sally with a female body

choices: Reattach Beth to her body and explain what happened...
Play with your girlfriends body. After all, she isn't exactly here to say no...
124132222112211.content:
Sally picked you up and headed back to the guillotine. It had also just occured to you that Beth didn't seem awake... or conscious when she was dropped into the box. You suspected that Sally had something to do with that. No matter. It was obvious that she planned on turning you into her boyfriend which felt really REALLY werid. Sally might have become 100% female, but her face still looked plastic and her hair still looked fake.

At the moment, she didnt seem to be bothered with that. Heh. Her mistake.

As you correctly predicted, Sally put your tiny head on your doll body through the stocks of the guillotine and sliced it through cleanly, leaving no residue plastic. Discarding the plastic body she once had, she took your head back into your room and was about to reattach your head to your body when she suddenly stopped.

"It just occured to me that you might try and struggle and hurt me when I put your head back on" She said. You were about to reply when she interrupted. "Well don't bother. As you said, this is your girlfriends body, now mine. And I know you'd hate to see anything hurt your new girlfriends body, would you?"
'Might be Beth's body, but your head is still plastic garbage' You thought.
"No... I wouldnt" You said, acting defeated.
"Good!" Sally said happily.
'She might be alive now, but she's as stupid as you'd expect a plastic supermodel to be' You thought.

Sally reattached your head to your body and it suddenly expanded back to it's normal size. Sitting up, you got a feel for your old muscles back and checked to ensure that everything was still in place.
Sally was about to say something, but before she could utter a word, you violently punched her hard in the face, knocking her to the ground. Sally had been caught off guard and you took your short few milliseconds to get on top of her, roll her over so she was face down and then proceed to hold her arms together.

Your girlfriend did work out and it seemed that Sally was trying to use it against you. Sadly for her however, she had only had a body for a short while and it's pretty unfair to compare experience with bodies when it comes to years. Kicking and screaming, you manhandled Sally out to the guillotine and forced her head through it.
SLICE! The sharp guillotines blade came down and chopped her head clean off. Sally was still thrashing her now decapitated head and body around trying to gain some hold of a clearly lost situation. You saw her intake air to start screaming but that was also quickly cut off by a strip of duct tape.

To ensure that she couldnt do anything to hurt your girlfriends body, you stuck Sally's head to a small piece of wood, severing the connection between head and body.

Beth's body now lay silently on the ground. Sally's head looked furiously at you, getting redder by the second. Two thoughts struck you now.
124132222112211.title: Sally takes you back to the guillotine

choices: You accidently cut off your own head
You accidently cut off your girlfriend's head
1241322221122111.content:
You literally punch yourself in the head to get the perverted thoughts out. Not that you're against having a little fun with your girlfriends body, but now wasn't the time. She'd just been knocked out and decapitated by a psychotic doll. So you gently pick up Beth's head and making sure it lined up perfectly, put her head back onto her body. As though it were magic Beth woke up, looked into your eyes and said, "What the fuck!"

"I can explain!" You said as Beth jumped off the bed and went for the door.

"You're lucky I'm not calling the cops! I come over here because you text me, and when I get over here you knock me out and put me on your bed! You sick FUCK!"

Okay, this did not look good, "But it wasn't me! It was Supermodel Sally! She stole my body and did those things to you, but I tricked her and got my body back after she cut your head off and stole your body...and you don't believe a word I'm saying." Beth was looking at you like you were a crazy person, and after hearing what you just said you couldn't really blame her. "Look, Sally's head is right here, she'll tell you. Tell her Sally." But Sally's plastic head just sat there on the piece of wood. "Okay she's being a bitch and isn't talking, but I can prove it. Put your head in the guillotine." You said as you grabbed the guillotine and started walking towards Beth.

Beth did not take this well and ran out of the room screaming. Knowing that there was no way you could let her leave without showing her you weren't crazy. You weren't crazy right? No no of coarse you aren't crazy. Emily and her living doll could prove that. So with the magic device still in your arms you chase after Beth and just before she could reach the front door you tripped and the guillotine blade flew into the air and when it landed, a head fell along with it. But whose was it?
1241322221122111.title: Reattach Beth to her body and explain

12413222211222.content:
"Ian?" Emily says.

"Is that you?" Polly says.

"Oh, thank God!" you say as Polly grabs you. "Apparently your supermodel doll is a cu-"

"You found Supermodel Sally?!" Emily interrupts.

"Yeah, apparently she was in the toy box. I used the guillotine to swap my and her heads, and she left me in here while looking for a new female body."

"Oh, crap!" Polly says. "We gotta find her!"

Polly places you in her cleavage while she holds onto Emily and searches for Supermodel Sally outside. You all spot Sally...
12413222211222.title: Emily and Polly save the day

choices: "OK. Just promise to sew me if I get messed up."

"I agree," Polly says.

"We should take showers."

"Hey Emily, you know how you take a shower, and I take a ride in the washing machine and dryer."

"Yeah, so- wait. Are you saying that we should swap cleaning places?"

"Indeed, I am."

Emily thinks about it. Then she says,
12413222212.title: Emily and Polly's POV

124132222122.content:
"Plus, my human head would be obliterated in there," Emily adds.

"OK, then," Polly says. "So we both take a shower together?"

"Yeah, that would be better. Or a bath, even."

Polly picks up Emily and takes her to the bathroom. The doll then strips Emily's body down.

Polly is amazed at the assets Em's body has. Her doll head seems out of place on Emily's human body.

"So, what do you think, Emily? Bath or shower?"

Witnessing the strange sight of his doll's head on top of her body, then looking at her own head on her doll's body, Emily picks,
124132222122.title: "Nah, it's kinda weird."

1241322221221.content:
"Just like old times," Polly says, agreeing with her owner. She starts the bath water, then puts bubble bath in there. She then picks Emily up and they both go into the bathtub.

Polly washes her new body, while Emily attempts to wash her hair. However, her doll hands make this task impossible. "Polly," she asks, "can you help me with my hair?"

"You helped me with mine, so sure." The button-eyed doll puts shampoo in Emily's hair and rubs it.

***************************
After the bath, Polly puts on new dry clothes.

"Why, does it bother you?"

"Not at all..."

choices: "...stitch this doll body a bit? I see a few rips on it."
"...drop me off at my boyfriend's house? I want to see his surprised look."
12413222212211.content:
"And I like you being a doll, too," Polly says, picking Emily up.

"Thanks," Emily says. "Hey Polly, can you do something for me?"

"Yes."

"Can you..."
12413222212211.title: "I like being a doll."

choices: "We put both our heads on my body."
"I slice a tiny piece of my neck and attach it under your head."
12413222212212.content:
"I thought you would," Polly says, "but I am afraid if we swap bodies now, then I will lose my consciousness."

"You're probably right," Emily, who shrugs her doll shoulders, says.

"But I do not mind. After all, it is your body."

Emily smiles. "I think I have an idea that will satisfy us both."

1332112112.content:
You often think back to the day you became one of your mother's 'trophies'. After she removed your body and ability to speak, she immediately did the same to your sister, before packing the both of you, as well as the guillotine up and driving off, all before your dad even got home. Because your access to news is limited, you have no idea what he thinks might have happened, but you're certain that he didn't take it well. Anyway, he's almost certainly dead by now.

You see, it's been over a hundred years since your mother started her 'collection'. And it is a collection now, not just you and your sister. Your mother has been steadily expanding it, ever since that fateful day, using the captured bodies as a labor force. She has been able to keep herself young by swapping her brain into younger bodies whenever she feels her current one has gotten too old. As for the heads and bodies she has collected, heads seem to stop aging after they reach the appearance of a twenty-year-old as long as they don't have bodies, and the same goes for bodies without heads. Until recently, she had kept her collection small, until she had saved up enough to buy a large mansion on a beachfront property, miles away from anywhere else. She has been able to avert the suspicion that would normally fall on her by claiming to be a series of different owners over the years.

Her original body has also finally given birth by the way. It was a girl, who your mom decided to name Nodia. Not 'Nadia' but 'Nodia'. At first you thought it was just a stupid pun, but you quickly realized the true reason for it. Not long after Nodia was born, your mother cut her head off as well, and stole her body too. Nodia grew up without ever realizing that she ever even had a body. The only difference between her and you is that your mother let her keep her voice, which you have to admit, sounds lovely. The reasoning behind this is that Nodia won't complain about her situation, because she doesn't realize things could ever have been any other way.

You and the other heads (there's about a hundred and fifty of you), despite being helpless, are fairly well looked after. You aren't fed much or given much to drink, but that's okay because it seems being a disembodied head removes the need to eat and drink. All you really require is entertainment, which is provided by a bunch of televisions, books, and other things that are kept in what has come to be known as the head room, where you and the others are usually kept. There's also pets, in the form of the disembodied dog heads, or limbless ferrets. Sometimes your mother even takes a few of you on trips with her. Always to isolated locations though, where there is no risk of anyone seeing you. At first you communicated with each-other by reading one another's lips, but recently you have developed a language comprised of the few sounds you can still make (mostly comprised of whistles, hums, and tongue clicks). You have actually met a few people you like, including Tom, who is now your best friend, and Erica, who would be your girlfriend, if you disembodied heads HAD genders anymore. Despite all that however, you all still wish you could have your bodies returned to you.

One day you and your new friends are talking when your mom enters the head room with one of her bodies pushing a strange package. {What do you think that is?} you ask Tom in a series of clicks. {Dunno,} he whistles back. {Whatever it is though, it's pretty big.} {Oooh,} says Erica. {I hope it's a fish tank! Remember that time we got to go diving? That was fun!} You and Tom smile. She's talking about the day, your mother took the three of you to the beach with her. She put each of you into a watertight glass sphere and had one of her bodies carry the three of you around under water. It was pretty amazing, especially since you didn't have to come up for air, due to not having lungs. All the spheres were really there to do was keep your vision clear. Anyway, your mother has just unveiled whatever was in the strange package. As it turns out, Erica had gotten her wish. It's a huge aquarium, which your mom says she's going to have filled over the next few days. That certainly promises to be exciting.

You mother stood there with her mouth open as Emily called her friend Bridget.

"Hey Bridget, it's Emily from class," she said calmly.

"Hey Emily," Bridget replied, "are you using a pay phone or something?"

"My phone broke and I'm using my brother's," she hastily said, "Listen, do you want to come over right now? I have something cool to show you."

"Yeah sure," Bridget said cheerfully. "I'll be right over." Emily hung up my phone and turned back towards where my mother was. She crossed her arms and looked furious. Emily began to go over the devious plan that she came up with for my mom.

"Here's how its going to work," she explained. "Bridget is going to come over and your going to take her body. Since you want a break from your body, I'll give it to you. Bridget will take Kyle's body and I'm taking my body back. Kyle, I'll find a new body for you to take once we deal with mom."

"Why are you giving me Bridget's body?" your mom asked somewhat scared.

"Bridget is probably the only girl in class that is less developed than I am. Her life is terrible and she often wishes that she could leave it. I want you to experience this life to see just what you put Kyle through for the last month. Also, I want to help out Bridget," Emily remarked. Your mom looked downtrodden for a minute realizing that she was not in control of the situation anymore. She would have to live the life of this Bridget girl for as long as Emily and you wanted. You actually felt bad for your mother for a minute before realizing that she had forced you into this exact same situation. You felt no sympathy for her anymore. However, you still pulled Emily aside for a minute.

"Emily, is this really alright?" you asked her concerned. "You aren't acting like yourself at all."

"It will be fine," she replied. "We'll get everything figured out when mom isn't here." You were a bit skeptical about her mental state but chose to see this through. After all, you wanted to see mom punished too. Eventually Bridget arrived on her bicycle and headed into the garage.

"Hey Emily," she started when she saw Emily's face. "What's going..." she stopped cold when she saw the rest of her body. She dropped her bike onto the concrete floor and covered her mouth in shock. "What happened to you?"

"Well, my brother found a magical guillotine that can exchange body parts and a series of events led us to this," she explained, not wanting to tell the entire story so far. Bridget walked over to your sister and felt her muscles then walked over to your mom, whom Bridget thought was you, and felt Emily's body. Her eyes lit up upon the discovery that this was actually real.

"Wow this is so cool!" she exclaimed almost jumping into the air out of joy. "Can I try it out?"

"Yeah, that's why I called you over here," Emily replied. Not knowing about the plan, Bridget asked if she could try out
134111111111.title: Bridget, the extremely dorky girl from her class.

1341111111111.content:
"Well, if I can," she started out shyly, "I would really like to have your mother's body." You and Emily both looked at each other in a state of shock. Emily had told her about her new baby sister and that your mother was still recovering from the pregnancy. Seeing our reaction to her request, Bridget started to chew on her hair. "If it's too much to ask, I'm sorry."

"Bridget, it's fine," Emily tried to console her. "It's just that my mom just had a baby and is still recovering. you can have her body if you want but I didn't think that you would want to."

"I want to have a mature and confident body," Bridget quietly replied locking her eyes on your breasts. "I don't mind the recovery part if it means I can get out of this body." Clearly Bridget had some self-confidence issues but had her mind dead-set on having your mom's body. Bridget, however, was concerned about the safety of the guillotine and wanted someone else to go first.

"Well, I think that Kyle here would be happy to volunteer," Emily said in a haughty tone. She grabbed your mom, who was still in Emily's body, and guided her into the guillotine. Your mother struggled for a little bit but eventually accepted her fate. The blade dropped down and cut her head off of Emily's shoulders. Your mom's head fell into the basket placed behind the guillotine. Emily picked it up and placed it onto the nearby table then moved her former body out of the way. Bridget's eyes grew to the size of pool balls as she witnessed the entire process. She hastily jumped into the guillotine and Emily cut her head off in the same way.

"Wow," Bridget said while walking around headless. "Just wow." She bent down to pick up her head and proceeded to walk around enjoying the feeling in the same way that you had once. Finally it was your turn to get cut up. Emily repeated the process with you and you were left headless like the other two girls.

"Now for the magic to happen," Emily announced. She seemed more confident than before. She walked with her shoulders spread instead of her usual slump. This was the first time that you also saw her genuinely smile. Maybe it was a good thing that she had your body; she was somehow a much more assertive person with more self-esteem. You walked your body over to where Bridget was and motioned her to put her head on your mother's body. Her anticipation built up as she gingerly moved her head onto your mom's neck stub. Immediately, you lost the feeling in your mom's body while Bridget's body fell to the floor. She didn't even notice as she was too enthralled by her new body. She displayed the same initial reaction that Emily had earlier. However, instead of the despair that Emily had felt, Bridget felt complete happiness.

"Hooray!" She shouted, jumping up and down while squeezing her new breasts. "I can't believe it!" However, in that moment, you heard your baby sister start to cry in the other room. Bridget stopped jumping and looked toward the source of the crying. "Since I'm technically the mother right now, does that mean that I get to breast feed her now?"

"Yeah honey," you replied imitating mom's tone. "Just be careful and don't over do it. Do you need to know what to do?"

She squealed in delight. "Thank you so much! I know exactly what to do." She ran out of the room leaving Emily, your mom, and you.

"You aren't really going to put my head on that body are you?" your mom called out as Bridget left. That was the last straw, you were fed up with your mom.

"Yes, mom," you said with a passion. "What you did is unforgivable. I think I speak for the both of us when I say we don't want you in this family anymore." The look on her face when you said that was the only thing that could get you to feel guilty about all this. It was a look of pure shock, pure betrayal, and pure disbelief. She didn't speak anymore to you guys as Emily placed her head onto Bridget's body. She looked herself over in disbelief and disgust before breaking down crying on the floor.

"Why are you doing this to me?" she cried in desperation. "I only wanted to have a break from my life. Do you know how hard it is?"

"I do know how hard it is," you replied. "And I know how hard you made it for me. Think of this as another break from your body. You're going to be Bridget now until you learn how you made me feel." With a little more conversation, your mom learned the basics of Bridget's life and how to live it. She eventually left on Bridget's bike, unsure of what she would ultimately find or if she would ever get back to her own body.

You and your sister breathed a sigh of relief and Emily attached your head to her body. It felt great to have a body that wasn't your mother's, even if it was an under-developed girl's body. You felt healthy and full of energy and that was all you needed to be right now. You and Emily could always trade back later anyways.

"Emily, Kyle, Beth, I have something that I need to say to you" Bridget called from inside your living room. You and Emily trudged into the living room to find Emily nursing baby Sarah and cradling her. "Where's Beth?" she asked when only you two came in.

"Well, we gave her your body," Emily said. "and she took your bike and went back to your house with it actually. She's going to be living your life for a while."

"That's fine," she stated in a calm and oddly motherly tone. "That actually makes things easier. The thing is, after spending some time alone with the baby and away from my house, I've decided." She stopped talking and took in a deep breath. "I want to stay with you guys, as a part of your family." You were dumbstruck. How could a girl who had your mother's body for five minutes suddenly decide to want to stay with us forever. Her family must have been absolutely terrible to her before.

"The thing is, Emily has been like a sister to me whenever I needed to talk to anyone. She is probably the most caring person I have ever met." Emily blushed at this. "I've also heard some great things about you Kyle. I just feel like this is where I belong. What do you guys say?"

You and Emily fell silent for a minute not knowing how to respond to this. You had kicked your mom out of the house hoping that she would learn a lesson. Although you had never intended it to be permanent, Bridget came up with a good point. She would probably be a better mother than Beth could have ever been. She was sweeter, kinder, and it would let Bridget escape her harsh life and family. However, you would be forcing your mom to live out her terrible life. You knew that she was a terrible person but did you really think that she deserved to be punished this much? After some debate with Emily, Bridget finally interrupted your thoughts.

"Emily, Kyle," she stated softly. "Can I become your new mother?"
1341111111111.title: your mother's body.

13411111111111.content:
"Yes," you replied. "We would love to have you as our new mother." Bridget started to tear up and cry tears of joy.

"I really love you guys," she said back. She finished breast feeding the baby and set her back down in a baby carriage. Sarah slowly drifted off to sleep. Bridget stood up and embraced you and your sister. "This is really going to happen now, isn't it? I'm really going to be Beth Holster." You all stood around and hugged each other for a while before finally breaking it up and telling Bridget the truth. Now that she was part of the family, she would need to know this. You told her about your mom's evil plot to steal your body and about how you delivered Sarah. When the story was finished, Bridget confirmed that forcing your old mom into her old life was not a harsh thing to do given the circumstances. After talking with Bridget for another couple hours, you and your sister switched back to your rightful bodies.

Things started to change around your household. With Bridget as your new mother, the atmosphere became more cheerful to live in. Bridget had acclimated well to being your mother, slowly gaining your old mothers mannerisms until Bridget could pass off as Beth. She legally changed her name to Bridget Holster soon after. Your father, who until now had been drifting away from your mom, was suddenly all over Bridget. Their love life rekindled and Bridget loved the idea of being married, especially the benefits that came with it. Sure she had lost about thirty years of her life, but it was all worth it for her happiness. Your father remained completely oblivious.

Your sister also gained something out of all this. From her time that she spent in your body, she learned to be confident in herself for who she was. She stopped being the self-conscious shy girl and branched out, quickly meeting new people and learning to love who she was. She was even able to find a boyfriend with her new found confidence and they have been going out for a while now. Your relationship with her has never been stronger. Even after you moved out of your old house, you never lost contact with her or your new mom.

You gained a lot from the whole ordeal as well. You learned how to be compassionate towards others and managed to strengthen relationships with some of your distant friends. In addition, you learned the intricacies and problems of being a woman from the long time spent in your mother's body. When you asked that cute girl you had a crush on out, she thought you were the most sensitive person that she had ever met. The two of you moved into an apartment straight out of college and have been going steady for a while now. All in all, your life and your family's life was strengthened as a result of the guillotine.

All that was left was your mother. Her new parents and brother continued to be mean to the old Bridget and your mom finally learned her lesson about how to treat others. When she was finally able to leave her abusive household for college, she was a much more compassionate person with a new outlook on life. She stopped being bitter and looked towards the future. She was thirty years younger and didn't have a responsibility in the world! The possibilities were endless with Bridget's grades and her street smarts.

The guillotine was returned to the store where it came from and was never seen again. However, you were happy with what it did to your family.

You sat on your bed feeling bruised and sore from when you fought off the crazed ladies who took you apart. You hoped Sarah was alright, she had warned you to flee and her friends might choose to punish her for that. You knew your family could be home at any moment and you had tried to call them to warn them about the crazy ladies in your garage but you remembered you had your phone on you when your clothes were stripped away and you hadn't had time to grab anything when you fled.

While you were sitting on your bed, brooding, you heard a knock at the door and you instinctively went to open the door but hesitated as it might've been a trap. "Who is it?" You asked cautiously.

"It's Emily," you heard your sister say in a desperate voice. "Please open the door," she begged.

She was scared and confused and you knew immediately that Sarah's friends must've gotten to your family. Still you couldn't risk opening the door to a possible ambush, even if your sister did need your help. "Is there anyone with you?" You asked hoping you sister wouldn't lie to you in a situation like this.

"They left a few minutes ago, as they drove off they told me you had ran to your room," Emily informed you.

You trusted your sister so you walked over to the door and unlocked it. You opened to see a distraught Emily looking at you and you went to hug her for comfort when you noticed something different about her body, she was now pregnant, no that wasn't right, she had your mother's body from the neck down. You took a step back to see if they had done anything else to her and noticed she now had feet instead of hands.

"What happened? Where's mum? Whose feet are they?" You asked in shock unable to process your sister's form.

"Mum, dad and I came home to find 12 women in the garage chopping up Sarah with a guillotine, before we knew what was happening they grabbed us and dragged us over to the guillotine as well. After that they grabbed our dog and cut off her head placing mum's body on the dog. They then taunted and teased us by having mum do doggy tricks and play fetch with dad's.... privates before they tied her up in the backyard and left with my body, dad and Sarah." A family member discovers a magical guillotine at a magic shop called Franz Joseph Illusions.
